The State of Alabama:

                  To the Sheriff of Lawrence County Greeting

wheras it has been reppresented to the undersigned an
acting justice of the peace for Said County by the President
and Directors of Tuscumbia Courtland and
Decatur Rail Road Company that it is necessary
to cut + Run their Road through the South East
+ South West quarters of Section 16 in Township 4 and
Range 9 West which is the property of Said Township 
reserved for the benefit of Schools therein and that Said com-
missioners of Said Township + Said Company cannot
agree as to the damages which Said Township will
Sustain by locating Said Road upon part of Said
lands not can they purchase a Sufficiency of
Said land upon which to construct Said Road
and the Said President + Directors having petitioned
me to grant them a warrant in pursuence of the
5 Section of their charter for the purpose of condemn
ing a Sufficienct of Said land for the construction of
Said Road and assessing the damages which Said
company Shall pay therefore and having reppre
Sented that a tract Sixty Six feet in width will be
needed for the construction thereof There are therefore
to command you forthwith to Summon a Jury of Seven
disinterested freeholders of your country to meet upon Said
